column7: SP: 17-> Heal all Allies equal to MAG +10.
SP: 20-> Double your defence for this battle.
SP: 15. Reduce Enemy DEF and MDEF by 10 points.
SP: 10. Return all allies's condition to normal.
SP: 200. Excite all allies. Grants them another turn.
SP:5. DMG +5 -> Restores health equal to damage dealt.
Sp: 7 DMG +0. Deals Damage without subtracting enemy's defence.
SP:10 DMG +0. Attack 5 times with a higher critical rate.
SP: 20. DMG +18. Raise your DEF and MDEF by 5 for the rest of the battle.
SP:10. Gain a bonus to damage equal to the amount of health you are missing.
SP:25. Attack twice. The first strike negates defences. The second strike heals you.
SP: 30. Grant all allies bonuses to attack equal to this unit's attack.
